column3: 1 Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer
3 Heat-Heat a large pan on medium heat
5 Add-Add 1 large minced garlic cloves to the pan
6 Cook-Cook garlic until fragrant (about 1 minutes). Be careful not to burn garlic
11 Cook-Cook for 2 minutes or until the zoodles are done
13 Top-Top with more parmesan if desired
